Reviews.Title: came with wrong user's manual.
Reviews.Author: neutrino
Reviews.Content: The camera is great although  rather  complicated for a point and shoot. Image quality is quite good, but unless you view them on a very nice monitor, hard to tell the difference from less expensive camera.I am very concerned about the package I received. Wrong and poorly printed user's manual came with the camera. When I power on the camera, language was not set in English. The box only has Japanese characters all over it, no English. I suspect this is a repackaged merchandise from Asian market although I can't confirm that.

Reviews.Title: Best DSLR alternative to-date!
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I consider myself a photo-enthusiast and have only used Nikon SLRs and DSLRs over the years.  Having all the gear is great but I really want to take good, quality images without loosing the ability to manually adjust and use filters.  I found the perfect solution with Sony's RX100M2.  This camera is amazingly versatile.  Worried you'll loose the ability to attach the CPL or ND filter? Check Magfilters and threader adapter ring. Your shoulders will love you!

Reviews.Title: dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Abe
Reviews.Content: At first looking at size in the  picture seems large enough, but when I got it , was really dissappointed, you don't have enough space to hold it
